column1: Funeral services will be held on Monday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. in the Abriola Parkview Funeral Home
column5: Trumbull and at 11:30 a.m. in St. Patrick Church
column6: Bridgeport for a Mass of Christian Burial. Interment will follow in Mountain Grove Cemetery
column7: Easton. Friends and relatives may call at the funeral home on Monday morning from 9:00 to 11:00 a.m.
